Posts.Content: May 4, 2008 04:00PM Beatrice wrote: Is there anyone out there that says no way, too bad, im not wearing false anything or do reconstruction. Ive had enough surgery and i am what I am. Everyone tells me to stuff my shirt, oh doesnt it look to flat, Too obvious. I had bilat mast, cancer in both breasts plus pagets disease of the nipple. Yes I sure do miss my breasts, but why do I have to go thru more pain to look "normal". Mad, angry & frustrated
Posts.Title: Will I get a layer of fat? mke mke
